```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
DF = read.csv("LIBRARY/XLSX/FitNotes_Export.csv") %>% 
  filter(Reps != 0 & 
           Exercise %in% c("Decline Barbell Bench Press",
                         "Sumo Deadlift",
                         "Barbell Squat",
                         "Overhead Press")) %>% 
  mutate(Volume = Weight * Reps, 
         Date = as.Date(Date, 
                        format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
         OneRM = Weight / ( 1.0278 - 0.0278 * Reps ),
         Perc1RM = Weight / OneRM * 100) %>% 
  arrange(Exercise)


ggplot(DF, aes(x = Date,
               y = OneRM,
               color = Exercise)) +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, 
              aes(fill = Exercise)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = OneRM,
                 size = 1 / Reps,
                 alpha = Perc1RM),
             position = "jitter") +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45,
                                   vjust = 1.25,
                                   hjust = 1),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        text = element_text(size = 15)) +
  scale_x_date(Date, 
               date_breaks = "1 day", 
               breaks = waiver()) +
  facet_grid(DF$Exercise) +
  scale_color_viridis(discrete = T) +
  scale_fill_viridis(discrete = T)


```
